body.ab: President of the Senate, pro tempore

In accordance with a Resolution of the Senate of the United States, adopted January 8th, 1868, I have the honor to transmit, herewith, copies of the Opinions officially given by me in relation to the pay of retired and reserved officers of the Navy.
body.note: see Op. A. G. No 68—op. Book p 222
